newsitem.title: USA: Central U.S. carlot beef trade 1500 CDT -USDA.
newsitem.headline: Central U.S. carlot beef trade 1500 CDT -USDA.

text.p: Utility carcasses not established; Cutter firm compared to last tested market. Demand and offerings moderate. - USDA
COW & BULL CARCASS FOB OMAHA 3.0 Loads Reported.
Lds Price Range Latest Estb. Mkt.
BONELESS PROCESSING BEEF/BEEF TRIMMINGS 80.0 Loads Reported.

Lean boneless beef steady to 2.00 lower; 65% 3.50-4.00 lower compared to last test. Demand light for moderate to heavy offerings. Beef trimmings weak on moderate demand and moderate to heavy offerings.
Chm Ln Lds Price Range Wtavg
**ABCDE after quotes represents days since last actual market test. Quotes are dropped after 5 days of no test or before if they no longer reflect current market conditions.**
